00001 /*
00002  *  maven Programming Language
00003  *  Created by Elliot Chance <elliot@chancemedia.com>.
00004  */
00005 
00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_StringList.h"
00008 #include "struct_MavenCompiler.h"
00009 #include "strings.h"
00010 #include "errors.h"
00011 #include "struct_MavenObject.h"
00012 #include "variables.h"
00013 
00014 string compilerFunctionSelector(MavenCompiler* c, string signature, string args, string& type) {
00015         // find the function we are trying to select
00016         if(signature.substr(0, 10) != "<Function:") {
00017                 pushError(c, "@selector is not a function");
00018                 return MAVEN_INVALID;
00019         }
00020         
00021         StringList parts = split(',', signature.substr(10, signature.length() - 11));
00022         int fnID = atoi(parts[0].c_str());
00023         int foID = atoi(parts[1].c_str());
00024         int fID = atoi(parts[2].c_str());
00025         string ptrType = c->namespaces->at(fnID).objects->at(foID)->functions->at(fID).returnType;
00026         
00027         // build the selector function
00028         args = trim(args);
00029         if(pushSelector(c, args)) {
00030 #if MAVEN_OS == 1
00031                 c->postLines.push_back("void* " + args + "$selector(void* v) {");
00032 #elif MAVEN_OS == 2
00033                 c->postLines.push_back("int " + args + "$selector(void* v) {");
00034 #endif
00035                 c->postLines.push_back("maven::objectArray* argv = (maven::objectArray*) v;");
00036                 if(ptrType != "void")
00037                         c->postLines.push_back(ptrType + " *r = new " + ptrType + "[1];");
00038                 c->postLines.push_back("try {");
00039                 c->postLines.push_back("if(argv->length != " +
00040                                                            intToString(c->namespaces->at(fnID).objects->at(foID)->functions->at(fID).args.length()) +
00041                                                            ") throw new maven::SelectorException();");
00042                 string caller = "";
00043                 for(int i = 0; i < c->namespaces->at(fnID).objects->at(foID)->functions->at(fID).args.length(); ++i) {
00044                         if(caller != "")
00045                                 caller += ",";
00046                         caller += "argv->a[" + intToString(i) + "]->toFloat()";
00047                 }
00048                 c->postLines.push_back(string(c->namespaces->at(fnID).name + "::" +
00049                                                                           c->namespaces->at(fnID).objects->at(foID)->name + "::" + args + "(") +
00050                                                            caller + ");");
00051                 c->postLines.push_back("} catch(maven::Exception* caughtGlobalException) {");
00052                 c->postLines.push_back("  std::cout << caughtGlobalException->description()->s;");
00053                 c->postLines.push_back("}");
00054                 if(ptrType != "void") {
00055 #if MAVEN_OS == 1
00056                         c->postLines.push_back("return (void*) r;");
00057 #elif MAVEN_OS == 2
00058                         c->postLines.push_back("return 0;");
00059 #endif
00060                 }
00061                 c->postLines.push_back("}");
00062         }
00063         
00064         // all done
00065         type = "maven.Selector";
00066         return "new maven::Selector(" + args + "$selector)";
00067 }
